TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit DocumentClientExtensions extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Extensions to enable reliability features for Azure DocumentDB client.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig class Microsoft.Azure.Documents.Client.TransientFaultHandling.IReliableReadWriteDocumentClient AsReliable(class Microsoft.Azure.Documents.Client.DocumentClient client, class Microsoft.Practices.EnterpriseLibrary.TransientFaultHandling.RetryStrategy retryStrategy) cil managed

Docs.param: Retry strategy to apply on request failures. Provided retry strategy will be wrapped into to speed up retries whenever server sends retry-after-ms header back to the client.
Docs.summary: Wraps provided client instance with retry logic to improve resilience for transient failures.

MemberSignature.Value: public static Microsoft.Azure.Documents.Client.TransientFaultHandling.IReliableReadWriteDocumentClient AsReliable (this Microsoft.Azure.Documents.Client.DocumentClient client, Microsoft.Practices.EnterpriseLibrary.TransientFaultHandling.RetryPolicy readRetryPolicy, Microsoft.Practices.EnterpriseLibrary.TransientFaultHandling.RetryPolicy writeRetryPolicy);

.method public static hidebysig class Microsoft.Azure.Documents.Client.TransientFaultHandling.IReliableReadWriteDocumentClient AsReliable(class Microsoft.Azure.Documents.Client.DocumentClient client, class Microsoft.Practices.EnterpriseLibrary.TransientFaultHandling.RetryPolicy readRetryPolicy, class Microsoft.Practices.EnterpriseLibrary.TransientFaultHandling.RetryPolicy writeRetryPolicy) cil managed

Docs.param: Retry policy to execute retries on read (idempotent) request failures.
Retry policy to execute retries on write request failures.
Docs.summary: Wraps provided client instance with retry logic to improve resilience for transient failures. When this overload is used, retry-after-ms header will not be honored, unless is used.
